sqlMap.select: SELECT p.id as perm_id, r.id as res_id, r.resource_type as res_type, r.resource_mapping as res_mapping, p.external_type as perm_ext_type, p.external_id as perm_ext_id, p.permission as permission FROM oskari_resource r LEFT JOIN oskari_permission p ON r.id=p.oskari_resource_id WHERE r.resource_type = #type# AND r.resource_mapping = #mapping#;

SELECT p.id as perm_id, r.id as res_id, r.resource_type as res_type, r.resource_mapping as res_mapping, p.external_type as perm_ext_type, p.external_id as perm_ext_id, p.permission as permission FROM oskari_resource r LEFT JOIN oskari_permission p ON r.id=p.oskari_resource_id WHERE r.id != -1 AND r.id = #id#;

select r.resource_mapping as resourceMapping, p.external_id as externalId from oskari_resource r, oskari_permission p where r.id=p.oskari_resource_id and p.permission = 'PUBLISH' and p.external_type = 'ROLE' and r.resource_type=#resourceType#

select r.resource_mapping as resourceMapping, p.external_id as externalId from oskari_resource r, oskari_permission p where r.id=p.oskari_resource_id and p.permission = 'DOWNLOAD' and p.external_type = 'ROLE' and r.resource_type=#resourceType#

select r.resource_mapping as resourceMapping, p.external_id as externalId from oskari_resource r, oskari_permission p where r.id=p.oskari_resource_id and p.permission = 'EDIT_LAYER_CONTENT' and p.external_type = 'ROLE'
select id from oskari_resource where resource_type=? and resource_mapping=? limit 1
select id from oskari_permission where oskari_resource_id = ? and external_type = ? and permission = ? and external_id = ? limit 1

select distinct r.resource_mapping from oskari_resource r, oskari_permission p where r.id=p.oskari_resource_id and r.resource_type=#resourceType# and p.external_type=#externalType# and p.permission=#permission# and p.external_id IN
#externalId[]#

select r.id as id, r.resource_mapping as resource_mapping, r.resource_type as resource_type, p.external_id as externalId, p.external_type as externalType, p.permission as permission from oskari_resource r, oskari_permission p where r.id=p.oskari_resource_id and r.resource_mapping=#resourceMapping# and r.resource_type=#resourceType# and p.external_type=#externalIdType#

select r.id as id, r.resource_mapping as resource_mapping, r.resource_type as resource_type, p.external_id as externalId, p.external_type as externalType, p.permission as permission from oskari_resource r, oskari_permission p where r.id=p.oskari_resource_id and r.resource_mapping=? and r.resource_type=? and p.external_id=? and p.external_type=?

SELECT l.id as layerId, p.external_id as externalId, p.external_type as externalType, p.permission FROM oskari_resource u, oskari_permission p, oskari_maplayer l WHERE u.id = p.oskari_resource_id AND u.resource_mapping = l.type || '+' || l.url || '+' || l.name AND p.permission = #permissionType#
l.id in
#idList[]#
ORDER BY l.id;

SELECT l.id as layerId, p.external_id as externalId, p.external_type as externalType, p.permission FROM oskari_resource u, oskari_permission p, portti_layerclass l WHERE u.id = p.oskari_resource_id AND u.resource_mapping = 'BASE+' || CAST(l.id AS character varying) AND p.permission = #permissionType#
l.id in
#idList[]#
ORDER BY l.id;

insert into oskari_resource (resource_mapping, resource_type) values (#mapping#, #type#) RETURNING id;

#idList[]#
